section.p: Family History Observations related to a particular family member are contained within a Family History Organizer. The effectiveTime in the Family History Observation is the biologically or clinically relevant time of the observation. The biologically or clinically relevant time is the time at which the observation holds (is effective) for the family member (the subject of the observation).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8599, CONF:1198-10496, CONF:1198-32605 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Family History Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem Type (SNOMED CT) 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2012-06-01 (CONF:1198-32427)
SHALL conform to Family History Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8586, R2.1=CONF:1198-8586)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8587, R2.1=CONF:1198-8587)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8592, R2.1=CONF:1198-8592)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem Type (SNOMED CT) 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2012-06-01 (CONF:1198-32427)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.1=CONF:1198-8590)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8590, R2.1=CONF:1198-19098)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8593, R2.1=CONF:1198-8593)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:8591, CONF:1198-8591)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8675, CONF:8676, CONF:15526, R2.1=CONF:1198-8675, R2.1=CONF:1198-8676, R2.1=CONF:1198-15526)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.31)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8678, CONF:8679, CONF:15527, R2.1=CONF:1198-8678, R2.1=CONF:1198-8679, R2.1=CONF:1198-15527)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Conforms to Family History Death Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.47)
entryRelationship with target entry Age Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:8677, R2.1=CONF:1198-8677)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="590856740"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10496 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46"
Consol Family History Observation entryRelationship with target entry Age Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:8677, R2.1=CONF:1198-8677)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Family History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8586, R2.1=CONF:1198-8586)
Consol Family History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8587, R2.1=CONF:1198-8587)
Consol Family History Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8592, R2.1=CONF:1198-8592)
Consol Family History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2008-12-18 (CONF:8589)
Consol Family History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.1=CONF:1198-8590)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8590, R2.1=CONF:1198-19098)
Consol Family History Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8593, R2.1=CONF:1198-8593)

Consol Family History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:8591, CONF:1198-8591)

Consol Family History Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8675, CONF:8676, CONF:15526, R2.1=CONF:1198-8675, R2.1=CONF:1198-8676, R2.1=CONF:1198-15526) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.31)

Consol Family History Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:8678, CONF:8679, CONF:15527, R2.1=CONF:1198-8678, R2.1=CONF:1198-8679, R2.1=CONF:1198-15527) Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS, and Conforms to Family History Death Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.47)
